turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: to confirm, you want regular crust for the other three pizzas, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 large pizzas, 2 meat lovers, 1 pepperoni and 1 veggie lovers with gluten free crust comes out to $40.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now or did i need to change anything?

turns.speaker: cashier

turns.speaker: cashier
